message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $120. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $90. I can do $110, which is the lowest I can go. I'm confident you'll find it's worth it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $110, so I'll offer it to you for $105. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm still not sure if I can go up to $105. I'd be willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $110. I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'll meet you at $102. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $102. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider that?

I've already told you, Bob, I'm not willing to go below $110. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $107. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're getting frustrated, Alice, but I'm still not willing to meet you at $107. I'd be willing to pay $90 for the product. This is my final offer. If not, I'll have to consider buying it from someone else.

I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $110, Bob. I think it's time to be honest with you, I've had a better offer from another buyer, and I'm considering selling to them instead. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $108. If not, I'll have to go with the other buyer.
